item.title: UK coronavirus death toll passes 28,000
item.description: The UK's COVID-19 death toll has risen by 621 to 28,131 as of May 1, just short of Italy.

item.title: Italy’s coronavirus death toll jumps
item.description: Deaths from the COVID-19 epidemic in Italy have jumped by 474, against 269 the day before.

item.title: Spaniards get out after 7-week lockdown
item.description: Thousands of Spaniards have woken up early on Saturday to lace up their running shoes for the first time in seven weeks after the government ended a prohibition on outdoor exercise.

item.title: Indonesia reports 292 new COVID -19 cases
item.description: Indonesia recorded 292 new coronavirus cases on Saturday, taking the total number of infections to 10,843, said health ministry official, Achmad Yurianto.

item.title: IS militants kill 10 in attack in Iraq
item.description: Islamic State militants have killed at least 10 Iraqi militiamen in a coordinated assault overnight near the central city of Samarra, security officials said. The attack added to concerns the extremist group that once controlled large areas of the country is staging a comeback.

item.title: UK hospital to begin COVID-19 blood trial
item.description: A potential treatment for Covid-19 using plasma from recovered patients is to be trialled by doctors at London's Guy's and St Thomas' hospital.

item.title: Japan to fast-track coronavirus drug
item.description: Japan will fast-track a review of Gilead Sciences Inc's antiviral drug remdesivir so that it can hopefully be approved for domestic COVID-19 patients a week after the US firm's filing for such approval, the health minister said.

item.title: More staff have virus at Sydney aged home
item.description: Another two staff members at Sydney's Newmarch House nursing home have tested positive for COVID-19 following the deaths of 13 residents.

item.title: Health authorities probe Newmarch lapse
item.description: NSW health authorities are investigating possible infection control breaches by staff of a Sydney aged care facility at the centre of a coronavirus cluster.

item.title: WA detectives probe fatal police shooting
item.description: Dozens of witness interviews will shape a probe into the fatal police shooting of a fly-in, fly-out worker who stabbed seven people in Western Australia's north.
